resources.string: Next, add all properties that you own or manage
Your are in the free 3 month trial which ends on 2/28/2021. Based on your current number of units, after that the price will be $5.00 per month
You haven not entered your billing info yet! Make sure you enter it before 2/28/2021 for continued access to Perma
Enter the rental property‘s address below. The Address is used to label each property, and to make it easier to log trips
Next we’d like some basic information about the property. if you input the Purchase Price then we can calculate your property‘s Cash on Cash Invested% correctly

If your property has a mortgage, then inputting its mortgage terms enables PerMa to automaticlly set the principal, interest, and escrow amounts when you log mortgage payment transactions. If you made extra principal payments, then logging them as mortgage principal transactions will update the amortization schedule
